attributes.action: introduce aminimum 3 year sentence to anyone found to be carrying a knife or any other weapon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'introduce aminimum 3 year sentence to anyone found to be carrying a knifeor any other weapon' How many more young innocent lives do we have to see taken before action is taken? We need more spot checks and an actual sentence in jail as punishment for anyone carrying a weapon, whether they have injured or not. We have all seen the news, I don't need to name names of the victims of this disgusting crime. Let's see something done. Please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
